name: Solitaire Boss
description:
The game that everyone knows, available where everyone is, with a twist everyone wants! Come play the most classic game in world with your friends or against virtual bosses. Download and play!!

Details:
- Classic draw 3
- Keep an eye on the clock
- Invite and play with friends and family!
- Play with tokens and earn more than ever
- Play for prizes and see who is the best card player
